    • Method Detail

      • addChip

        public boolean addChip(int i)
        Allows player to add a chip. If chip placed in a valid space on the board, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
        Parameters:
        integer - that represents the column to add chip
        Returns:
        true if chip is placed in a legal spot

      • isWinningState

        public boolean isWinningState()
        Checks if board contains a winning state.
        Returns:
        true if chips align in a winning state of Connect 4
